name: Mashed Sweet Potato
description: This Mashed Sweet Potato recipe is perfect for those looking for a healthy and delicious side dish. With its low sodium and low sugar profile, it's a guilt-free addition to any meal. Perfect for anyone following a healthy lifestyle, these mashed sweet potatoes are enriched with Parmesan cheese, offering a tasty twist on a classic favorite.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the sweet potatoes and cut them into chunks.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chunks into a pot and cover with water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the potatoes and return them to the pot.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the sweet potatoes until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the shredded Parmesan cheese until well combined and cheese is melted.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
